thread.section_title: Optimalprint Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Optimalprint | optimalprint.com.au
thread.title: Nicola - Perth WA
thread.title_full: Optimalprint reviewed by Nicola - Perth WA

author: Nicola - Perth WA
title: Nicola - Perth WA
text: I ordered 10 birthday invitations. They arrived within 3 days. Packaging was secure. The quality of the invitations was excellent. I actually received 22 invitations although I will not need them, it would be handy if you were having a huge party or if a few got lost in the mail. Extremely happy with the service I received and will use again in the future.
